mapper.select: SELECT n_id,n_title,n_createtime,n_body,n_img,n_type,n_recommend FROM mk_Article ORDER BY n_createtime DESC LIMIT #{start},#{end}
SELECT n_view,n_id,n_title,n_createtime,n_img,n_type FROM mk_Article ORDER BY n_createtime DESC LIMIT 0,16
SELECT n_id,n_title,n_createtime,n_body,n_img,n_type FROM mk_Article WHERE n_recommend="1" ORDER BY n_createtime DESC LIMIT #{start},10;
SELECT n_id,n_title FROM mk_Article WHERE n_createtime>#{n_createtime} ORDER BY n_createtime LIMIT 1;
SELECT n_id,n_title FROM mk_Article WHERE n_createtime<#{n_createtime} ORDER BY n_createtime DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT n_title,n_id,n_createtime FROM mk_Article ORDER BY n_click DESC LIMIT 5;
mapper.update: UPDATE mk_Article SET n_body=#{n_body},n_view=#{n_view},n_img=#{n_img},n_title=#{n_title},n_abstract=#{n_abstract}, n_createtime=#{n_createtime} WHERE n_id=#{n_id}
UPDATE mk_Article SET n_recommend=1 WHERE n_id=#{n_id};
UPDATE mk_Article SET n_recommend=0 WHERE n_id=#{n_id};
UPDATE mk_Article SET n_click=(SELECT t1.n_click+1 FROM (SELECT n_click FROM mk_Article WHERE n_id=#{n_id}) t1 ) WHERE n_id=#{n_id}
